attributes.action: Hold a Public Enquiry into the legitimacy of the EU Referendum Result
attributes.additional_details: If the result is found to be based on lies, cheating and misinformation, for that result to be declared 'null and void' and for the referendum to be re-run based on the actual consequences of leaving. Also for the immediate temporary suspension of Article 50 until such a time as the public enquiry is complete and a decision reached based upon the result of that public enquiry.
attributes.background: We the undersigned require that the government hold a public enquiry into the legitimacy of the result of the European Union membership referendum of June 2016.
